GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.14 to before v5.4.223
GSD.description:
ALSA: ac97: fix possible memory leak in snd_ac97_dev_register()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.223 by commit 758dbcc6fbf2286eff02743b093c70a18a407d66, it was introduced in version v2.6.14 by commit 0ca06a00e206b963587ac471e6d1c52bf33b9a18. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ALSA: ac97: fix possible memory leak in snd_ac97_dev_register()
